body:
After Yukari help rasing the child Marisa can finally meet her in person, the child says that she thought her mother hated her, and that she is kinda overwhelmed by all the new information about her parents, but she is very happy, the end.
oh end she also wonders how Marisa and Reimu can have a child giving that both of them are female, but Marisa says that it's too early for her to know about those things

a little summary: Marisa gave up being a human so Reimu had to kill her, but she couldn't bring herself to do it, instead she told everyone Marisa is already dead and locks her up, after having sex with her she got pregnant, 12 years later we see a girl said to be the new shrine maiden lost a fight, then some self monologue about her mother's death after giving birth to her she is at the place where Marisa was locked up, a witch appears behind her and tells her that she can teach her the other half of her power (because she is half human half witch) after some time the girl finally managed to beat her friend and Marisa gave her all of her memory about she and Reimu, apparently Reimu already knew she couldn't survive giving birth to their child, so she ask Marisa to take care of their child for her, Marisa of course agrees but because she is a witch she couldn't get into the human town and shortly after Reimu's death Yukari appears and Marisa can only watch her own child from far away.
Yep, look at her stomach at page 32
I thought they would have a kid.
